text: Achari/Achary/Acharya (ஆச்சாரி in tamil) is a last name used by members of the (Viswabrahmin) Vishwakarma community native to the states of Tamil Nadu, Andhra Pradesh, Karnataka and Kerala in India.Castes And Tribes Of Southern India by Edgar Thurston, K. Rangachari,. Volume 3. pp.126. In Southern India Achary is also a term used to indicate Guru."The word Achari originates from Acharya which is the name given to the chief gurus", Sacred Hindu Symbols, , , Gautam Chatterjee ==See also== *Acharya ==References== Category:Indian family names
title: Achari (surname)
